attributes.action: provide properties owned by the government to MPs to be used as second properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The second home allowance is completely unnecessary. Whilst others have tried to get it removed entirely I believe that a more reasonable course of action would be to get the government to provide second properties to MPs directly. Perhaps a block of flats somewhere? All maintenance and spending on the apartments would be taken out of MPs hands and there would no longer be a need for a second home allowance at all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
